00254     void set(nitf::DateTime dateTime, std::string format = NITF_DATE_FORMAT_21) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00255     {
00256         NITF_BOOL x = nitf_Field_setDateTime(getNativeOrThrow(),

00262     nitf::DateTime asDateTime(std::string format = NITF_DATE_FORMAT_21) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00263     {
00264         nitf_DateTime *x = nitf_Field_asDateTime(getNativeOrThrow(),
00265                 (char*)format.c_str(), &error);
00266         if (!x)
00267             throw nitf::NITFException(&error);
00268         nitf::DateTime d(x);
00269         d.setManaged(false);
00270         return d;
00271     }

00388     {

00390         NITF_BOOL x = nitf_Field_get(getNativeOrThrow(), outval, vtype, length, &e);
